attributes.action: Call for Mark Field to resign as the MP for the Cities of London and Westminster
attributes.additional_details:
This Borough has a fine tradition of progressive thought and openness towards civilised debate. The recent action by Mark Field MP at a Mansion House dinner was in complete contrast. As well as his unacceptable and apparently instinctive use of force against a woman, he demonstrated a contempt for the principle of peaceful protest. 
 
Mr Field's behaviour was not becoming of the office he holds and is entirely indefensible.
attributes.background: As an extremely concerned resident of Westminster Borough, I’m calling for Mark Field MP to stand down as the Member of Parliament for the Cities of London & Westminster.

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for the MP and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
